results.title: Atenolol treatment of late luteal phase dysphoric disorder.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ treatment of late luteal phase @<m>DISEASE_Premenstrual_Dysphoric_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065446 @@@dysphoric disorder@@@.

citations.NLM: Rausch JL, Janowsky DS, Golshan S, Kuhn K, Risch SC. Atenolol treatment of late luteal phase dysphoric disorder. J Affect Disord. 1988 Sep-Oct;15(2):141-7. PMID: 2975684

results.title: Treatment of a patient with seasonal premenstrual syndrome.
results.text_hl: The authors identified a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who had @DISEASE_Premenstrual_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011293 @@@premenstrual syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Premenstrual_Dysphoric_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065446 @@@late luteal phase dysphoric disorder@@@) only in the fall and winter and was virtually asymptomatic during the spring and summer.

citations.NLM: Parry BL, Rosenthal NE, Tamarkin L, Wehr TA. Treatment of a patient with seasonal premenstrual syndrome. Am J Psychiatry. 1987 Jun;144(6):762-6. PMID: 3296791
citations.BibTeX: @article{3296791, title={Treatment of a patient with seasonal premenstrual syndrome.}, author={Parry BL and Rosenthal NE and Tamarkin L and Wehr TA}, journal={Am J Psychiatry}, volume={144}, number={6}, pages={762-6}}
